title: Secrets Manager
introduction: Explore recommended content and resources to help you get started with IBM Cloud Secrets Manager.

links.title: Best practices for organizing your secrets and assigning access

section_highlights.title: Intro to IBM Cloud Secrets Manager
section_highlights.description: In this video, Alex Greer with IBM Cloud, explains how IBM Cloud Secrets Manager provides a way for users to create secrets dynamically and lease them to applications while being able to control access from a single location.

section_highlights.title: https://www.ibm.com/blog/manage-secrets-in-continuous-delivery-with-ibm-cloud-secrets-manager/
section_highlights.description: IBM Cloud Continuous Delivery has introduced support for IBM Cloud Secrets Manager in CI/CD toolchains.
